meanings.meaning_en_US: A proposed explanation for a phenomenon, which can be tested through study and experimentation.

examples.sentence: The scientist developed a [hypothesis] to explain the results.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 科學家制定了一個假說來解釋結果。

examples.sentence: Her [hypothesis] was supported by the experimental data.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的假說得到了實驗數據的支持。

examples.sentence: They will test their [hypothesis] in the next phase of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將在下一個階段測試他們的假說。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A belief or set of beliefs held and taught by a church, political party, or other group.

examples.sentence: The church's [doctrine] influences its followers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教會的教義影響其信徒。

examples.sentence: They debated the [doctrine] of the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們爭論這一政黨的教義。

examples.sentence: The legal [doctrine] is based on previous court cases.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 法律的教義基於前幾次的法庭案件。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Distributed over a large area; occurring in many places.

examples.sentence: The disease was [widespread] in the region.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該疾病在該地區廣泛流行。

examples.sentence: There is [widespread] support for the initiative.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項倡議得到了廣泛的支持。

examples.sentence: Widespread reports of the event filled the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 對該事件的廣泛報導充滿了新聞。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of obstructing or hindering something.

examples.sentence: The radio signal suffered from [interference] during the storm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 暴風雨期間，無線電信號受到干擾。

examples.sentence: His [interference] was unhelpful and caused more problems.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的干擾沒有幫助，反而引起更多問題。

examples.sentence: We need to reduce [interference] in this process.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要減少這個過程中的干擾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To reverse the action of something.

examples.sentence: You can [undo] the last operation if you made a mistake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你犯了錯，可以撤銷上一個操作

examples.sentence: He wants to [undo] the changes made to the document.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想撤銷對文檔所做的更改

examples.sentence: Don't forget to [undo] your last action.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要忘記撤銷你最後的操作

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a tendency to do something; likely or inclined.

examples.sentence: He is [apt] to forget names.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他容易忘記名字。

examples.sentence: The child is [apt] at learning languages quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個孩子學習語言的能力很強。

examples.sentence: She has an [apt] sense of humor that everyone enjoys.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有著人人喜愛的幽默感。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of declaring something to be untrue.

examples.sentence: His [denial] of the accusations only made people more suspicious.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對指控的否認只讓人們更加懷疑。

examples.sentence: The patient went into [denial] about his illness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 病人對自己的疾病進入了否認狀態。

examples.sentence: She was in [denial] about her financial situation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她否認了自己的財務狀況。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A standard or principle by which something is judged or decided.

examples.sentence: The main [criterion] for admission is academic performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 入學的主要標準是學業表現

examples.sentence: They set their own [criteria] for success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為成功設定了自己的標準

examples.sentence: Each [criterion] is important for evaluation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一個標準對評估都很重要

meanings.meaning_en_US: A process of voting, in writing and typically in secret.

examples.sentence: Each citizen received a [ballot] for the election.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位公民都收到了選舉的投票。

examples.sentence: He filled out his [ballot] carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他小心翼翼地填寫了投票。

examples.sentence: The [ballot] counting will begin after the polls close.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 投票開始後，計票將會開始。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A domain or a field of activity.

examples.sentence: She is an expert in the [realm] of astrophysics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是天體物理學領域的專家

examples.sentence: In the [realm] of fantasy, anything is possible.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在幻想的領域裡，任何事情都是可能的

examples.sentence: His contributions to the [realm] of literature are notable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對文學領域的貢獻是顯著的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Attractive or impressive because of being unusual or remarkable.

examples.sentence: Her [striking] features caught everyone's attention.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她驚人的特徵吸引了每個人的注意。

examples.sentence: The painting has a [striking] use of colors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這幅畫在顏色使用上很驚人。

examples.sentence: He delivered a [striking] performance on stage.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在舞台上呈現了驚人的表演。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A traditional story, especially one concerning the early history of a people or explaining a natural or social phenomenon.

examples.sentence: In ancient times, many cultures had their own [myths].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在古代，許多文化都有自己的神話。

examples.sentence: The [myth] of Hercules is well-known.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海克力士的神話是眾所周知的。

examples.sentence: Some [myths] explain the creation of the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一些神話解釋了世界的創造。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make practical and effective use of something.

examples.sentence: We should [utilize] our resources wisely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們應該明智地利用我們的資源。

examples.sentence: She will [utilize] her skills in the new job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將在新工作中利用她的技能。

examples.sentence: The program aims to [utilize] technology for better education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該計劃旨在利用科技來改善教育。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To open or make something accessible.

examples.sentence: He learned how to [unlock] his phone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他學會了如何解鎖他的手機

examples.sentence: You need a key to [unlock] the door.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要一把鑰匙來打開這扇門

examples.sentence: The software will [unlock] additional features.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個軟體將解鎖額外的功能

meanings.meaning_en_US: A solemn promise or agreement.

examples.sentence: He made a [pledge] to support the community.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他承諾支持社區。

examples.sentence: The [pledge] was taken seriously by the volunteers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 志願者們非常認真地對待這個承諾。

examples.sentence: She signed a [pledge] to protect the environment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她簽署了承諾保護環境。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To combine or cause to combine to form a single entity.

examples.sentence: The two companies decided to [merge] their resources.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩家公司決定合併他們的資源。

examples.sentence: When you [merge] layers in Photoshop, be careful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在Photoshop中合併圖層時要小心。

examples.sentence: Our departments will [merge] next year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們的部門將於明年合併。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A medium-sized sailboat or motorboat used for pleasure or racing.

examples.sentence: They rented a [yacht] for their vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們租了一艘游艇度假。

examples.sentence: He dreams of owning a luxury [yacht].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他夢想擁有一艘豪華游艇。

examples.sentence: The race featured several impressive [yachts].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 比賽中有幾艘令人印象深刻的游艇。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flowering plant that is not woody, typically having green, soft stems.

examples.sentence: Basil is a popular [herb] used in cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 羅勒是烹飪中常用的草本植物。

examples.sentence: She planted an [herb] garden in her backyard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在後院種了一個草本植物花園。

examples.sentence: Many [herbs] have medicinal properties.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多草本植物具有醫療特性。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having the necessary ability, knowledge, or skill to do something successfully.

examples.sentence: She is a highly [competent] engineer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位非常有能力的工程師。

examples.sentence: Only [competent] individuals are promoted to management positions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 只有有能力的人才能晉升到管理職位。

examples.sentence: The team performed better after hiring more [competent] staff.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在聘用更多有能力的員工後，團隊表現更好。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who writes for newspapers, magazines, or news websites or prepares news to be broadcast.

examples.sentence: The [journalist] interviewed the politician.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位記者採訪了這位政治家。

examples.sentence: She is a well-respected [journalist] in her field.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是其領域內備受尊敬的記者。

examples.sentence: Many [journalists] work under tight deadlines.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多記者在緊迫的截止日期下工作。
